text.text: How does ZOLL Billing populate the run number field upon importing a claim?

text: ZOLL Billing populates the run number field upon importing a claim by selecting one of the following NEMSIS fields: eResponse.01, eResponse.03, eResponse.04. This setting is configurable and can be changed at any time. Changing this setting does not affect claims that have already been imported.

text.text: What are the options for selecting the run number field during claim import in ZOLL Billing?

text: ZOLL Billing populates the run number field upon importing a claim by selecting one of the following NEMSIS fields: eResponse.01, eResponse.03, eResponse.04. This setting is configurable and can be changed at any time. Changing this setting does not affect claims that have already been imported.

text.text: Can you explain the configurable options for populating the run number field in ZOLL Billing?

text: The configurable options for populating the run number field in ZOLL Billing are: eResponse.01, eResponse.03, eResponse.04. The default is eResponse.04.

text.text: Where can you find the settings to configure the run number field selection during claim import in ZOLL Billing?

text: To configure the run number field selection during claim import in ZOLL Billing, you can find the settings in the NEMSIS imports section.

text.text: What are the default options for selecting the run number field in ZOLL Billing's NEMSIS imports section?

text: The default option for selecting the run number field in ZOLL Billing's NEMSIS imports section is eResponse.04.

text.text: How can you change the setting for populating the run number field in ZOLL Billing?

text: To change the setting for populating the run number field in ZOLL Billing, you can go to the NEMSIS imports section and select one of the three options: eResponse.01, eResponse.03, eResponse.04.

text.text: Does changing the run number field selection setting affect previously imported claims in ZOLL Billing?

text: Changing the run number field selection setting does not affect claims that have already been imported.

text.text: Can you clarify the significance of the run number field in ZOLL Billing's claim import process?

text: The run number field is used to populate the claim's run number when importing a claim. The setting for populating the run number field is configurable and can be changed at any time. Changing the setting does not affect claims that have already been imported.

text.text: Are there any considerations to keep in mind when configuring the run number field selection in ZOLL Billing?

text: When configuring the run number field selection, you should keep in mind that the setting is configurable and can be changed at any time. Changing the setting does not affect claims that have already been imported.

text.text: What steps should be followed to save changes made to the run number field selection in ZOLL Billing's settings?

text: To save changes made to the run number field selection in ZOLL Billing's settings, you should follow these steps: 1. On the navigation bar click Settings 2. Scroll down until you find the NEMSIS imports section 3. Select one of the three options 4. Scroll down and click Save .
